mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_ACCT_LOG t where t.ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_ACCT_LOG ( ID, USERID, USERCODE, USERNAME, YWCODE, YWNAME, TRANCODE, TRANNAME, TRANSTATUS, TRANAMT, TRANPOINT, TRANTIME, TRANDESC, BALAMT, BALPOINT, REMARKS, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, cashAmt, sendAmt, channelId, channel, companyId, orgId, orgName, operatorCode, operatorName ) VALUES( #{info.id:VARCHAR}, #{info.userid:VARCHAR}, #{info.userCode:VARCHAR}, #{info.userName:VARCHAR}, #{info.ywCode:VARCHAR}, #{info.ywName:VARCHAR}, #{info.tranCode:VARCHAR}, #{info.tranName:VARCHAR}, #{info.tranStatus:NUMERIC}, #{info.tranAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.tranPoint:NUMERIC}, #{info.tranTime:VARCHAR}, #{info.tranDesc:VARCHAR}, #{info.balAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.balPoint:NUMERIC}, #{info.remarks:VARCHAR}, #{info.createtime:VARCHAR}, #{info.updatetime:VARCHAR}, #{info.cashAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.sendAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.channelId:VARCHAR}, #{info.channel:VARCHAR}, #{info.companyId:VARCHAR}, #{info.orgId:VARCHAR}, #{info.orgName:VARCHAR}, #{info.operatorCode:VARCHAR}, #{info.operatorName:VARCHAR} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM TB_ACCT_LOG WHERE ID in
#{ids}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM TB_ACCT_LOG t WHERE 1=1
and ( 2=1 or t.ID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.USERCODE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.USERNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.YWCODE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.YWNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.TRANCODE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.TRANNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.TRANDESC LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.REMARKS LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') )
order by t.UPDATETIME DESC
